targets.expr: min(min_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_ready{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

sum(max_over_time(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)
sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (container)

sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (container)
sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (container)

sum by(container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (container)
sum by(container, name) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="",container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="",container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)
sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__range]))
sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range]))

sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__range])) / sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range]))
sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range]))

sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__range])) / sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory"}[$__range]))

sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_cache{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_swap{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_max_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
sum by (container, name) (last_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))

options.content:
- Raw usage = RSS + Cache
- RSS is actually allocated memory
- Cache = Active + Inactive file
- WSS = Raw usage - Inactive file

What to look for:
- WSS reaching limit causes file garbage collection
- RSS reaching limit causes OOM

targets.expr: sum by (container, name) (max_over_time(container_memory_usage_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!="", container=~"$container", image!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content:
Read/write from NFS and SMB shares
will not be shown in the storage throughput.

Cadvisor exports data from cgroup io.stats,
which are only calculated for block devices.

targets.expr: sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(container) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", container=~"$container", cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
